and lactate elevation
What are the treatments for leukoencephalopathy with brainstem and spinal cord involvement and lactate elevation ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of LBSL:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Leukoencephalopathy with Brain Stem and Spinal Cord Involvement and Lactate Elevation  - Genetic Testing Registry: Leukoencephalopathy with Brainstem and Spinal Cord Involvement and Lactate Elevation   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis
